titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of1986 to increase the adjusted gross income limitation for above-the-line deduction of expenses of performing artist employees, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of1986 to increase the adjusted gross income limitation for above-the-line deduction of expenses of performing artist employees, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
